variables.name: agent_tag
variables.description: String: ARM tag applied to the new agent.
variables.query: What Azure ARM tag should be applied to the new build agent?

variables.name: azdo_pat
variables.description: String: Azure devops personal access token.
variables.query: What Azure DevOps personal access token should be used?

variables.name: azdo_repo_url
variables.description: String: Url of the Azure DevOps organization.
variables.query: What is the url of the Azure DevOps organization? (e.g. https://dev.azure.com/orga)
